feedback: One Word To Describe Their Service - Awesome. Last month, I was looking desperately for house, that's when found out Vharabari. I went on their website, rented a house and the next day I moved in my new house. Renting was not that easy before.
name: Farhad Jamil

feedback: An wonderful platform for the owners. I don't have to worry about rent now. Through easy payment system I receive my rent at the start of the month without any hassle.
name: Swapnil Aanam

feedback: They gave me the security check I was looking for. Before Vharabari, I lived in few rented houses, but the owners of those houses never cared about my complaint. With Vharabari, They ensured, each problem of mine is heard by the owner.
name: Redowan Ahmed
